list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a prickly bush or shrub that typically bears red, pink, yellow, or white fragrant flowers, native to north temperate regions. Numerous hybrids and cultivars have been developed and are widely grown as ornamentals.
a stylized representation of the flower in heraldry or decoration, typically with five petals (especially as a national emblem of England).
a warm pink or light crimson color.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the rose and gold of dawn
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: hoa hồng và vàng của bình minh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a perforated cap attached to a shower, the spout of a watering can, or the end of a hose to produce a spray.
any light pink wine, colored by only brief contact with red grape skins.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a warm flush now rosed her hitherto blue cheeks
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một tuôn ra ấm áp bây giờ cấy má màu xanh của cô ấy
